message: I'm sad that there is so much hatred and pain in America.
World poverty is at an all time low. Hate to bring facts to the table.
Sanders sold out to Hillary...like so many others. Money talks to those on the take! :-(
heartbreaking.
Many women's moisturizing/ anti aging creams have estrogen. They aren't required to disclose estrogen on the ingredients list. Crazy, huh?

It's a kid thing. Everything in moderation, including gaming. That they treat it as a crime is rather silly I think. That the child is obsessed with it most likely means that there's something big missing in his life. What kind of person will that experience mold?
How nice n for her mother's wish to be granted!

Why are you lying to your viewers about Hillary beating Trumpp? Your lies will be the cause of Trump becoming president. This is the second poll that shows her losing to Trumpp. The only candidate that beats Trumpp consistently is Bernie Sanders.
they've done more by 7:30 a.m. than I'll probably do all day. I'm still in bed :-(

My kids have a huge Halloween party every year!!! Not sure how much we have spent over the years... But we buy a little more every year, to add to our decorations. (You have to change it up a little..).
I seriously doubt we will ever see the famous tax returns. I would like the IRS to say even if they are auditing him, he can release his returns.
Don't count on it the new younger leader is a crazy control freak.

Hillary Clinton has never accomplished anything that has been a benefit to me. She has done things that have negatively impacted my life. Her and Bill's dealings with the laws have put many people in jail for nonsense. I was in boot camp for the military, when she voted to enter the Iraq war. It is obvious that she is against the environment because she is pro fracking. I have watched her straight up lie, under oath, on more than one occasion. Yet somehow she is supposed to be the next president... Hell no!
How embarrassing!

Ha ha , brilliant , probably are , but more importantly it's great to see that there are still Guardian readers (?) who retain their humour. So an Irishman , a Muslim............. better not!!
Pot meet Kettle, he has the gall to call the president unfit. Bobby take a hard look in the mirror! Hey Republicans go ahead keep company with this clown the Dems will win again!
We need more men that can think on his feet! Right and wrong is not complex if you have a compass to guide your thoughts. Thank you Sheriff Clarke keep calling out the thieves of truth and reason!
